title: Aldiko Book Reader Premium Android

Description

Features:
Fully-customizable reading experience: adjust font size, font type, font and background colors, margin, alignment, line spacing as well as brightness to best suit your preference. Aldiko Book Reader also supports night-time reading.
User-friendly interface: Aldiko Book Reader supports both Android phones and tablets. You can create your own bookmarks anywhere in the book and rapidly jump to a different section of the book through the table of content.
Advanced library management system : import your own EPUB and PDF files into the app to read them on the go; organize your eBooks by tags and collections. Aldiko will also remember your reading position automatically and resume the book right where you left it the last time.
In-app shopping experience: browse huge catalogs of eBooks, including best-sellers, new releases and classics (lots of them for FREE)
Other cool features not to miss: global-text search in a book, support eBooks from public libraries, add your own favorite catalog and many more
